message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $13,000. I think it would be a valuable addition to your inventory and am confident you'll be pleased with its performance.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $9,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $10,500? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to be careful with my expenses.
